God of War

Quick Facts

  • Release Date: April 20, 2018
  • Developer: Santa Monica Studio
  • Publisher: Sony Interactive Entertainment
  • Platforms: PS4, PS5, PC
  • Genre: Action Adventure
  • Price: £39.99

Game Description

*God of War* follows Kratos and his son Atreus on an epic journey through Norse mythology. Experience intense combat, emotional storytelling, and breathtaking visuals as Kratos seeks redemption in a new world.

Key Features

  • Dynamic and brutal combat system
  • Deep father-son narrative
  • Open-world exploration with hidden secrets
  • Mythical Norse creatures and gods
  • Visually stunning environments
  • Engaging RPG elements and upgrades

Game Systems

Combat

Master the Leviathan Axe and shield combat in intense battles.

Exploration

Discover hidden realms and solve puzzles in the Norse world.

Character Progression

Upgrade weapons, unlock skills, and develop Atreus’ abilities.

Ready to Battle the Norse Gods?

Join Kratos and Atreus on their legendary journey!
